WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please read the documentation about Optimizing, you are doing it wrong.1) You need to mark the actual enchants as available with green diamonds (not just put it on the weapon)2) Wrong3) You need to edit the item to mark it unique (I'm pretty sure it gives you a warning that tells you how to do this)
WorkItem.Description:
1. Rawr treats Abomination Knuckles as a 2H weapon for the purpose of enchants.  (It's a fist weapon.)  No matter which enchants I select, it complains that I haven't chosen any, and it doesn't apply any.
2. When I select "Any" under enchants, the optimizer chooses "No Enchant" instead of the best one.
3. The optimizer warns me that it will assume that I have two gutbusters.  How do I tell it that I have only one?  Or for greater efficiency, how do I tell it to use the gear that I am currently wearing and optimize the enchants only?
